mapper.select: SELECT id FROM choice.fund_group_sub WHERE fund_group_id = #{fundGroupId}
select id fund_group_id,fund_group_name from fund_group_${oemId}

select * from fund_group_sub_${oemId} d,strategy a,fund_group_${oemId} b,fund_basic e,fund_group_details_${oemId} c where a.fund_group_id = b.id and b.id = c.fund_group_id and c.fund_code = e.code and c.fund_group_id=d.fund_group_id and d.id=c.fund_group_sub_id and ABS(d.risk_num - #{riskValue}) < 0.00001 and ABS(d.income_num - #{returnValue}) < 0.00001 and c.fund_group_id=#{groupId}

select a.fund_type_one,a.fund_group_id,sum(proportion) proportion from (select * from fund_basic a, fund_group_details_${oemId} b where a.code = b.fund_code and fund_group_id = #{id} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subId}) a GROUP BY a.fund_type_one

select a.fund_type_two,a.fund_group_id,sum(proportion) proportion,a.fund_code from (select * from fund_basic a, fund_group_details_${oemId} b where a.code = b.fund_code and fund_group_id = #{id} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subId}) a GROUP BY a.fund_type_two,a.fund_code

select a.fname, a.fund_type_one, a.fund_type_two, a.fund_group_id, proportion, a.fund_code from (select * from fund_basic a, fund_group_details_${oemId} b where a.code = b.fund_code and fund_group_id = #{id} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subId}) a
select fund_code from fund_group_details where fund_group_id = #{fundGroupId} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subGroupId}
select * from fund_group_sub_${oemId} where fund_group_id = #{id} and id=#{subGroupId}
select * from riskcontroller where fund_group_id = #{id} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subGroupId}
select id,risk_num,income_num from fund_group_sub_choose where fund_group_id=#{id} and standard_type=#{standardType} order by #{slidebarType}
select a.fund_type_two,b.navadj,b.navlatestdate navlatestDate from fund_basic a, fund_net_value b where a.code=b.code and a.code=#{fund_code} order by b.navlatestdate
select fund_group_name from fund_group_${oemId} where id=#{id}
select * from fund_group_history_${oemId} where fund_group_id = #{fund_group_id} and time >= #{time}

select * from fund_group_history_${oemId} where fund_group_id = #{fund_group_id}
and fund_group_sub_id=#{fund_group_sub_id}
select * from fund_group_expected_income_${oemId} where fund_group_id = #{fund_group_id} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subGroupId}
mapper.update: update fund_group_sub_${oemId} set sharpe_ratio = #{sharpeRatio} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert ignore into fund_group_history_${oemId} (fund_group_sub_id,fund_group_id,income_num, time) VALUES
(#{item.fund_group_sub_id},#{item.fund_group_id},#{item.income_num},#{item.time})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE income_num =
when DATE_FORMAT(#{item.time},'%Y%M%d') then #{item.income_num}
mapper.select: select interval_last_mod_time from fund_group_sub where fund_group_id=#{fund_group_id} and id = #{subGroupId}
select * from efficient_frontier where fund_group_id=#{fund_group_id}
select id,fund_group_id from fund_group_sub_${oemId}
select cust_risk from strategy where fund_group_id = #{id}
select maximum_retracement from fund_group_history where fund_group_id = #{id} and fund_group_sub_id = #{subId} and maximum_retracement is not null
mapper.update: update fund_group_sub set maximum_losses = #{maxLoss} where fund_group_id = #{fundGroupId} and id=#{subGroupId}
update fund_group_sub_${oemId} set maximum_losses = #{maximum_losses} where fund_group_id = #{fundGroupId} and id=#{subGroupId}
update fund_group_sub_${oemId} set expected_max_retracement = #{expected_max_retracement} where fund_group_id = #{id} and id=#{subId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT code FROM fund_group_basic_${oemId} WHERE is_valid='1'
SELECT DISTINCT code FROM fund_group_basic_${oemId} WHERE group_id !='0' AND is_valid='1'
SELECT code FROM fund_group_basic_${oemId} WHERE group_id ='0' AND is_valid='1'
SELECT group_id ,code FROM fund_group_basic_${oemId} WHERE group_id !='0' AND is_valid='1'
mapper.insert:
insert into fund_group_sub_${oemId} (id,fund_group_id,risk_num,income_num, expected_annualized_return,simulate_historical_year_performance, simulate_historical_volatility,create_time,interval_last_mod_time)
( SELECT #{details.subGroupId},#{details.groupId},#{details.subGroupRisk},#{details.subGroupYield}, #{details.expectedAnnualizedReturn},#{details.simulateHistoricalYearPerformance}, #{details.simulateHistoricalVolatility}, #{details.createDate}, #{details.combinationDate} FROM dual )
INSERT INTO fund_group_details_history_${oemId} SELECT * from fund_group_details_${oemId}
INSERT INTO fund_group_sub_history_${oemId} SELECT * from fund_group_sub_${oemId}
